WELCOME_TEXT: Sweets, coffee, or both? We have sweets from Sweden, a few from Japan--because why not? If you like to make your own bags up, then pick'n'mix is right for you. If you'd rather have ready-made bags, we have them too! We're working on a webshop for you--please be patient!
subject: Subject
contact_message: Please contact us here with any enquiries
